customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - The Oceanid's Concern

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Ah, the cat who wanders by the waters of Qingce Village told me the tale of the spirit of the waters..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Rhodeia of Loch" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, gains Elemental Lifeform: Hydro when the battle begins, and starts with the Talent Card "Streaming Surge" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Rhodeia of Loch
customize.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.desc:

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.name: Streaming Surge
customize.desc:
Flowing

The racing waters are a display of love toward a deceased deity.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - The Oceanid's Fury

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Ah, who would've thought that the disturbed Oceanid would turn the river water this bitter..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Rhodeia of Loch" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, gains Elemental Lifeform: Hydro when the battle begins, and starts with the Talent Card "Streaming Surge" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
